analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0x28925299ee1edd8fd68316eaa64b651456694f0f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/4/0x28925299ee1edd8fd68316eaa64b651456694f0f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0x28925299ee1edd8fd68316eaa64b651456694f0f.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
